alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Blaine; Garfield; Kingfisher; Major (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 4:03PM CDT until May 02 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Alfalfa County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northern Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Western Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... Eastern Major County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 403 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Ringwood to near Longdale, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Enid, Fairview, Okeene, Canton, Lahoma, Ringwood, Drummond, Longdale, Goltry, Ames, Meno, Hillsdale, Carrier, Isabella, southeastern Canton Lake, Homestead and Southard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
